title: PN Vasudevan resigns as MD & CEO of Equitas Small Finance Bank - Moneycontrol
content:
1. PN Vasudevan resigns as MD & CEO of Equitas Small Finance Bank  Moneycontrol
  2. Equitas Small Finance Bank MD and CEO PN Vasudevan resigns  CNBCTV18
  3. PN Vasudevan resigns as MD and CEO of Equitas Small Finance Bank  Times of India
  4. Equitas Small Finance Bank chief Vasudevan wants to step down to pursue distinct set of goals  Free Press Journal
  5. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Vasudevan, in his resignation letter, said he wants to devote his time towards social welfare through his public charitable trust.
